example_usage: Thoracentesis is puncture of chest wall.
Leukocytosis is increase in white blood cells.
Arthrodesis is surgical fusion of joint.
Anemia is low red blood cell condition.
Radiography is process of taking X-rays.
Cardiology is the study of the heart.
Hemolysis is destruction of red blood cells.
Pathology is the science of disease.

definition: Abnormal condition or disease or increase.

example_usage: Colostomy is creating opening in colon.
Hemiparesis is weakness of one side.
Leukopenia is deficiency of white blood cells.
Nephropexy is surgical fixation of kidney.

definition: Attraction to or affinity or love.

example_usage: Claustrophobia is fear of enclosed spaces.
Rhinoplasty is surgical repair of nose.
Hemiplegia is paralysis of one side.
Cardiorrhexis is rupture of the heart.
Colonoscopy is visual exam of colon.
Aortic stenosis is narrowing of aortic valve.
Phlebotomy is cutting into a vein.
